headline: Constellation Brands Stock Slumps. Why It Slashed Guidance.
summary: FEATURE  Shares of Constellation Brands sank Tuesday after the parent of the Corona and Modelo brands slashed its fiscal-year outlook, citing weaker consumer demand for beer.  Constellation Brands forecasts organic net sales to fall 4% to 6% fiscal 2026, compared to a previous range of down 2% to up 1%.

headline: Wall Street Lunch: PepsiCo Gains On News Of Elliott Investment's $4B Stake
summary: Shares of PepsiCo are gaining ground on the heels of reports that Elliott Investment Management has accumulated a substantial stake in the company.
